id-55786.title: Digital Marketing Agency
id-55786.post-content:
It’s one thing saying that it can be done and another showing that it can be done. And when it comes to letting your work do all the talking, a professionally designed website closes the deal for you with your prospective clients. 

Our Digital Marketing Agency template does that. The template is perfect for your agency website, from done-for-you templates showcasing all your individual services to customer reviews.

Key features of the Digital Marketing Agency template

  • Professionally crafted templates for your digital marketing agency website
  • Package comes with individual templates for all your services, such as branding, digital marketing, SEO services, and social media
  • Include customer reviews as well as ratings from Google, Facebook, and Trustpilot, among others
  • Build authority and showcase your expertise by publishing regular blog posts
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-55786.post-excerpt: Professionally crafted template best suited for a digital marketing agency website

id-58160.title: Jewellery Store
id-58160.post-content:
Want to sell jewelry to a broader audience? Consider building an online store! Import our easy-to-use Jewellery Store template and launch your store quickly. Accept orders and payments round the clock through your website.

The clean and minimalistic design has all the correct elements to help you build a high-converting store. From impressive background effects to displaying products based on categories and latest arrivals, Jewellery Store is the perfect web template for your store.

Key features of the Jewellery Store template

  • Clean and simple design that has everything you need to build a fantastic online store
  • Display products based on categories, such as earrings, necklaces, rings, and more
  • Product page displays various payment options as well as related products
  • Straightforward checkout process
  • Well integrated with the WordPress eCommerce plugin, WooCommerce
id-58160.post-excerpt: Beautiful website template perfect for building an online store to sell jewelry

id-53777.title: Fashion Influencer
id-53777.post-content:
Whether you are a fashion designer, blogger, influencer, or have anything to do with the fashion industry, the Fashion Influencer template is what you need to make a statement. 

The classy website design is perfect for promoting various fashion brands, products, accessories, clothing, and cosmetics, among other things. Publish blogs and articles on topics related to fashion and upload videos as well on your fashion website.

Key features of the Fashion Influencer template

  • Classy and sophisticated-looking template, perfect for a fashion-related website
  • Ideal for fashion influencers, bloggers, and just about anyone in the fashion industry
  • Showcase various fashion brands, products, blogs, articles, and videos
  • Integrate your Instagram feed and share photos with your website visitors
  • Fully customizable and responsive website template
id-53777.post-excerpt: Sophisticated-looking website design that’s perfect for making a fashion statement

id-51559.title: Public Speaker
id-51559.post-content:
Want to fill your calendar with speaking engagements? Build a website! To make it easier, we’ve crafted the Public Speaker web template. It’s a thoughtfully crafted template with everything you need to promote yourself as a professional speaker.

Include videos of your previous speaking engagements, and publish blog posts to build authority and trustworthiness, among other things. If you have your publications, the template is well integrated to let you sell them online.

Key features of the Public Speaker template

  • Thoughtfully designed template, perfect for a public speaker or an influencer
  • Promote videos of your speaking engagements
  • Package includes dedicated pages about the speaker, services offered, contact and even to sell your publications online
  • Want to offer live sessions? The template has you covered
  • Deep integrations with WooCommerce, allowing you to sell online
id-51559.post-excerpt: A thoughtful website template that’s perfect for building a website for public speakers

id-52222.title: Pub and Bar
id-52222.post-content:
Build your online presence and let customers connect with you before visiting your joint. Use the appealing Pub and Bar template to launch your website. Share photos of the ambiance, the exquisite food and drinks menu, and customer reviews, among other things.

The template has exciting features, such as online table reservations, details of upcoming events, deals and offers, and more. You also have the option to sell store merchandise online.

Key features of the Pub and Bar template

  • Take your pub and bar joint online with our appealing and attractive website template
  • Include photos of the joint, customer reviews, menu details, and more
  • Allow customers to make online table reservations
  • Sell your store merchandise online with our well-integrated WooCommerce template
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-52222.post-excerpt: The perfect lightweight and responsive template for taking your pub and bar joint online

id-49780.title: Meditation Courses
id-49780.post-content:
Want to offer meditation classes online? To make things simple, we’ve crafted an inspirational Meditation Courses template that’s sure to engage with your prospective students. By offering courses online, you reach a much wider audience who can learn through your platform.

The clean and appealing design uses unique colors, typography, and background effects. It’s fully integrated with leading WordPress LMS plugins, allowing you to create and manage online courses easily.

Key features of the Meditation Courses template

  • A beautifully designed meditation course template, sure to enhance user experience
  • Fully integrated with LMS plugins allowing you to create and manage online courses from your WordPress dashboard
  • The homepage showcases the featured courses, a list of all courses, student reviews, about the trainer, and more
  • All templates have been planned, including a fully functional contact form
  • Fully responsive and customizable template
id-49780.post-excerpt: Aweinspiring design that’s perfect for building an online course website on meditation

id-55643.title: Budget Hotel
id-55643.post-content:
Whether you’re taking your hotel business online or revamping your existing website, the Budget Hotel template is a must-have. The elegantly designed template has all the elements to build a professional and engaging hotel website.

The hero section not only has a significant image but also includes a CTA to check room availability. Other attractive templates include pages for rooms, facilities, things to do, and a fully functional contact form.

Key features of the Budget Hotel template

  • A professionally crafted design that’s perfect for a hotel website
  • Well-integrated and placed CTA for making online reservations
  • Google maps is integrated on the homepage that allows users to locate your property
  • Offer specials deals, include reviews of happy customers, and a lot more
  • Include a gallery that showcases your property
id-55643.post-excerpt: Build and launch your hotel website using our elegantly designed Budget Hotel template

id-51305.title: Relationship Coach
id-51305.post-content:
Are you a relationship coach? Want to offer services, such as couples problems, parent-child issues, and ​family issues, among other things? Build a website using our Relationship Coach template and help prospective clients to seek guidance and consultation from you, irrespective of their location.

The vibrant template is well planned out and includes all the correct elements in the right place. From well-placed CTA to customer reviews, the template has you covered.

Key features of the Relationship Coach template

  • Vibrant and attractive-looking template that’s easy to import and set up
  • Impressive background image scrolling effects
  • Dedicated and well-planned page layouts for selling books, showcasing your stage shows, and offering one-on-one consultations
  • Build authority and get found by search engines by publishing blogs consistently
  • Newsletter subscription form is well integrated into the template
id-51305.post-excerpt: Perfect template for building a vibrant-looking website for a relationship and life coach

id-56996.title: Tech Blogger
id-56996.post-content:
The Tech Blogger template is an easy-to-use, modern website template that lets you showcase the latest technology blog posts. Include the latest technology news and trends, hottest deals and offers, and posts on anything related to technology.

The template is designed to help you quickly start your own technology blog. You don’t have to be a tech expert or a web developer to create your own website.

Key features of the Tech Blogger template

  • Modern and professional-looking template best suited for a technology blog
  • Newsletter subscription form is integrated into the hero section, allowing you to capture the email IDs of visitors. This way, you can update them the next time you publish a post
  • Showcase the best deals and offers on the homepage as well as on a dedicated page
  • Template is fully customizable and can be tweaked to suit your needs
  • Use your favorite page builder to edit and customize content
id-56996.post-excerpt: A modern website template that lets you showcase the latest technology blog posts

id-51504.title: Creative Podcaster
id-51504.post-content:
Create your own podcast website in minutes with our Creative Podcaster template. With a clean and minimalistic design that highlights your latest episodes, your latest guests, and your latest reviews, it’s easier than ever to get the word out about your show.

The template includes an easy-to-use newsletter subscription form so you can start building up a loyal following of listeners who love what you do.

Key features of the Creative Podcaster template

  • Clean and minimalistic design that’s perfect for any podcaster
  • Showcase your latest episodes in a done-for-you template
  • Include details of your hosts, customer reviews, and more on the homepage
  • Easily customize the colors and typography of your website
  • Fully responsive and customizable template
id-51504.post-excerpt: Perfect website template for any podcaster looking to create their own online presence

id-57022.title: Tech News
id-57022.post-content:
Build a technology website using the Tech News template and share the latest trends related to technology, gadgets, software, apps, games, and more. The clean and clutter-free design will help your website visitors find what they're looking for without digging through piles of information. 

The template features a newsletter subscription form that will let you build your newsletter list quickly and easily.

Key features of the Tech News template

  • Simple and clutter-free website template, perfect for a technology website
  • The package includes well-planned layouts for individual category pages as well
  • Build an email list using the well-integrated newsletter subscription form
  • The template consists of placeholders for showcasing ads and monetizing your blog
  • Compatible with Gutenberg and all popular page builder plugins
id-57022.post-excerpt: Clean and simple website template, perfect for your technology news website
